value.stringValue: New Meeting Booked at Closed/Meeting Booked Journey

There was a new meeting booked at {!Get_contact.Account.Name} with {!Get_contact.Email} which already had a Meeting Booked or Closed Journey. Please have a review of the data and either update the current Journey as relevant or flag for RevOps if this is a systems issue.

assignments.name: Set_account_segment_to_contact_implied_segment
assignments.label: Set account segment to contact implied segment

assignments.name: Set_recordId_equal_to_found_event
assignments.label: Set recordId equal to found event

rules.name: Any_other_router_Outbound_SDR_Booker
rules.label: Any other router: Outbound SDR Booker

Flow.description: Removing `deal_owner` reference when assigning a new owner to the lead record. This is already being set by Chili Piper.

formulas.name: Account_Int_Stamp
formulas.expression: "CP Book a Demo - Int: "&{!$Flow.InterviewGuid}&") Who:"&{!recordId.WhoId}&" What: "&{!recordId.WhatId}

formulas.name: Opp_Name
formulas.expression: IF( {!recordId.Account.Name}="", {!Get_lead.Company} & " - Qualifying " & TEXT(MONTH({!Close_date})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!Close_date})), {!recordId.Account.Name} & " - Qualifying " & TEXT(MONTH({!Close_date})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!Close_date})) )

formulas.name: want_to_cover
formulas.expression: IF( {!recordId.Router_Name_CP__c} = "Book a demo", "*Wants to Cover:* "&{!want_to_cover_on_call}, NULL )

Flow.interviewLabel: Event - Chili Piper - Book a Demo Automations {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} || WhoId: {!recordId.WhoId} CP Queue: {!recordId.Queue_Name_CP__c} || CP Router: {!recordId.Router_Name_CP__c} || CP Booked By: {!recordId.Booked_By__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Booked_By__r.LastName} || CP Assigned to: {!recordId.Owner:User.FirstName} {!recordId.Owner:User.LastName} || CP Meeting Type: CP {!recordId.Meeting_Type_CP__c} || CP Next Assignee: {!recordId.Designated_Assignee_CP__c}
Flow.label: Event - Chili Piper Automations
